00001 #ifndef SM_COREDATA_EOD_FLMIDS_H
00002 #define SM_COREDATA_EOD_FLMIDS_H

00005 #include "eod/flmtypes.h"

00007 namespace sm
00008 {
00009     namespace eod
00010     {
00011         /*
00012             Here we define names and id values for the face landmarks.
00013             Refer to the FLM Standard.
00014             NOTE: Once defined, these values never change - they coincide with the externally released FLM standard.
00015             ALSO NOTE: This is not a comprehensive list of all the landmarks that may be produced by a tracking engine.
00016             Rather, these are landmarks commonly referred to in the tracking code. 
00017             The only way to list all the landmarks getting created by the engine is to enumerate a FaceOutputData produced by the engine.
00018             SM Internal link: <file:\\sm.local\dfs\FLIB\Doc\FLM Standard.pdf>
00019 
00020             @if SM_COREDATA_LANGUAGE_PYTHON
00021             RIGHT_EYE_OUTER_CORNER = 0 
00022             RIGHT_EYE_INNER_CORNER = 1
00023             LEFT_EYE_INNER_CORNER = 2
00024             LEFT_EYE_OUTER_CORNER = 3
00025             RIGHT_MOUTH_CORNER = 4
00026             LEFT_MOUTH_CORNER =5
00027             RIGHT_NOSTRIL = 6
00028             LEFT_NOSTRIL = 7
00029             OUTER_LIP_0 = 100
00030             OUTER_LIP_1 = 101
00031             OUTER_LIP_2 = 102
00032             OUTER_LIP_3 = 103
00033             OUTER_LIP_4 = 104
00034             OUTER_LIP_5 = 105
00035             INNER_LIP_0 = 200
00036             INNER_LIP_1 = 201
00037             INNER_LIP_2 = 202
00038             INNER_LIP_3 = 203
00039             INNER_LIP_4 = 204
00040             INNER_LIP_5 = 205
00041             INNER_LIP_6 = 206
00042             INNER_LIP_7 = 207
00043             RIGHT_EYEBROW_0 = 300
00044             RIGHT_EYEBROW_1 = 301
00045             RIGHT_EYEBROW_2 = 302
00046             LEFT_EYEBROW_0 = 400
00047             LEFT_EYEBROW_1 = 401
00048             LEFT_EYEBROW_2 = 402
00049             NOSE_0 = 500
00050             NOSE_1 = 501
00051             NOSE_2 = 502
00052             NOSE_3 = 503
00053             RIGHT_PUPIL_CENTRE = 600
00054             RIGHT_UPPER_EYELID = 601
00055             RIGHT_LOWER_EYELID = 602
00056             LEFT_PUPIL_CENTRE = 700
00057             LEFT_UPPER_EYELID = 701
00058             LEFT_LOWER_EYELID = 702
00059             @endif
00060         */
00061         enum FixedFaceLandmarkId 
00062         {
00063             // These are the facial landmarks that are commonly referred to as "Reference" points in the code.
00064             RIGHT_EYE_OUTER_CORNER = 0,
00065             RIGHT_EYE_INNER_CORNER = 1,
00066             LEFT_EYE_INNER_CORNER = 2,
00067             LEFT_EYE_OUTER_CORNER = 3,
00068             RIGHT_MOUTH_CORNER = 4,
00069             LEFT_MOUTH_CORNER =5,
00070             RIGHT_NOSTRIL = 6,
00071             LEFT_NOSTRIL = 7,
00072     
00073             // Lip points
00074             OUTER_LIP_0 = 100,
00075             OUTER_LIP_1 = 101,
00076             OUTER_LIP_2 = 102,
00077             OUTER_LIP_3 = 103,
00078             OUTER_LIP_4 = 104,
00079             OUTER_LIP_5 = 105,
00080             INNER_LIP_0 = 200,
00081             INNER_LIP_1 = 201,
00082             INNER_LIP_2 = 202,
00083             INNER_LIP_3 = 203,
00084             INNER_LIP_4 = 204,
00085             INNER_LIP_5 = 205,
00086             INNER_LIP_6 = 206,
00087             INNER_LIP_7 = 207,
00088     
00089             // Eyebrow points
00090             RIGHT_EYEBROW_0 = 300,
00091             RIGHT_EYEBROW_1 = 301,
00092             RIGHT_EYEBROW_2 = 302,
00093             LEFT_EYEBROW_0 = 400,
00094             LEFT_EYEBROW_1 = 401,
00095             LEFT_EYEBROW_2 = 402,
00096     
00097             // Nose points
00098             NOSE_0 = 500,
00099             NOSE_1 = 501,
00100             NOSE_2 = 502,
00101             NOSE_3 = 503,
00102     
00103             // Eye points
00104             RIGHT_PUPIL_CENTRE = 600,
00105             RIGHT_UPPER_EYELID = 601,
00106             RIGHT_LOWER_EYELID = 602,
00107             LEFT_PUPIL_CENTRE = 700,
00108             LEFT_UPPER_EYELID = 701,
00109             LEFT_LOWER_EYELID = 702,
00110         };
